You know my Grandfather smoked his whole life. I was about 10 years old when my mother said to him, 'If you ever want to see your grandchildren graduate, you have to stop immediately.'. Tears welled up in his eyes when he realized what exactly was at stake. He gave it up immediately. Three years later he died of lung cancer. It was really sad and destroyed me. My mother said to me- 'Don't ever smoke. Please don't put your family through what your Grandfather put us through." I agreed. At 28, I have never touched a cigarette. I must say, I feel a very slight sense of regret for never having done it, because this NTR hentai gave me cancer anyway.

Wife cheating on a normal ass, good dude and having another man's baby while talking mad shit about her husband?  Way to close to real.  I read this entire thing and was just absolutely disgusted by their behavior since it was basically exactly like real situations I've seen.  Other NTR is often completely ridiculous (and better drawn.  No offense artist) so if I want to get off quick to some crazy sex, I can still enjoy NTR occasionally.  While I personally don't believe in it, having personally seen a lot of successful, life long marriages myself, this is the kinda shit that make dude's go full on MGTOW.

I have a relative who had a video sent to him showing his wife fucking some guy they both knew. 

Relative filed for annulment, because they can't file for divorce and the video was used as evidence to show her adultery. Because my area can charge adultery as a crime, the wife is fucked literally and figuratively. 

With covid and the annulment finalised, she has a shit life now. Her fuck boy can't hold a job and is actually being hunted down by people he pissed off due to his fuck boy ways. 

Also, the two had kids and my relative has custody of them and they refuse to ever talk to their mom because of what she did. 

She is seen as a loose slut and everyone berates her for giving a good life just for some fucking. 

She's just begging for help from my relative because no one wants to hire considering what she did, so she's picked that life now. 

Manga and hentai are fiction but sometimes they are realer than real.
